varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
Warning number. 657 is still valid.
There is gale warning for Daneborg, Kangikajik, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Nunarsuit, Narsalik and Meqquitsoq.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Tuesday the 8. July, 18 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1005 hPa, northeast of Iceland, is moving towards westnorthwest to Kangikajik, gradually filling some. A low, 9805 hPa, over Labrador Sea, is moving slowly towards north.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: North and northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, this night in western up to gale, 15 m/s, Tuesday east and northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, becoming southeast and decreasing to 5 to 10 m/s. Locally fog and transiently rain from east, mainly moderate to poor visibility, Tuesday gradually some improving visibility from southeast.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 2,5 m.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Gradually north and northwest, increasing up to gale 10 to 18 m/s, Tuesday gradually cyclonic variable, up to gale about 15 m/s, in southernmost part mainly southwest and south, 5 to 10 m/s. Rain and moderate to poor visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 3,5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: North and northeast, 5 to 10 m/s, this evening decreasing and this night variable, below 8 m/s, Tuesday southwest becoming south , 3 to 8 m/s. In northern part locally rain with moderate visibility, otherwise good visibility, apart from fog patches.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: North and northeast, 5 to 10 m/s, locally up to 13 m/s, Tuesday gradually variable, below 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility, from this night rain in southern part.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: Northeast and north, 8 to 13 m/s, in southwestern part increasing to gale, 15 to 20 m/s, this night transiently up to 23 m/s. Rain with moderate visibility, and risk of fog patches

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 2,5 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: In northwestern gradually northeast, increasing to gale, 15 to 20 m/s, Tuesday decreasing to 10 to 15 m/s, otherwise southeast and east, 8 to 13 m/s, decreasing to 5 to 10 m/s, Tuesday becoming south and southwest. In periods rain and mainly moderate visibility, however risk of locally fog.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: In northern part gale from east and northeast, increasing to 18 to 23 m/s, during the night decreasing, otherwise east and southeast, 8 to 13 m/s. Tuesday in the whole water southeast and south, 5 to 10 m/s. In periods rain and mainly moderate visibility, however risk of locally fog.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 5,5 m. Swells: 4,5 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Gale from southeast and east, increasing to 18 to 23 m/s, Tuesday decreasing to 13 to 18 m/s, and from during the afternoon 8 to 13 m/s. In periods rain and mainly moderate visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 6 m. Swells: 4,5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Gale from east and southeast, 13 to 18 m/s, in southern part transiently 18 to 23 m/s. In periods rain and mainly moderate visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: In southwestern part east and southeast, 8 to 13 m/s, locally up to gale, 15 m/s, otherwise gradually variable, below 8 m/s, Tuesday in northern and eastern part gradually mainly around north, 5 to 10 m/s, locally up to 13 m/s. Rain and mainly moderate visibility, Tuesday some improving visibility from north, however with showers.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2,5 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Northeast and north, 8 to 13 m/s, from during the night decreasing to 3 to 8 m/s, and in eastern part variable, below 8 m/s. Risk of fog patches, otherwise good visibility.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Northeast and north, 5 to 10 m/s, Tuesday in eastern part variable, below 8 m/s. Locally fog, otherwise good visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Variable, below 6 m/s, this night around northwest, 3 to 8 m/s. Fog patches, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: Variable, below 6 m/s. Risk of fog patches, otherwise mainly good visibility.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 0,5 m. Swells: 1 m.
